name: Hybrid Performance Pro
description: A high-fidelity, Apple-aesthetic fitness tracker for managing elite 52-week hybrid periodization programs, integrating strength and endurance metrics with a liquid-glass UI.

iosPermissions.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Hybrid Pro needs access to your heart rate and workout data to calculate splits and recovery scores.
iosPermissions.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Hybrid Pro will log your completed workouts to your Apple Health rings.
iosPermissions.NSMotionUsageDescription: Used to track step count during Zone 2 outdoor runs.
